body_html:
If you are using collate_fn, and num_workers>0 with PyTorch version < 0.4:

MAKE SURE YOU DON'T RETURN ZERO DIM TENSORS FROM YOUR __getitem__() FUNCTION.
OR RETURN THEM AS NUMPY ARRAYS.

I fixed my bug of returning zeros dim tensors and the problem still exists.
body_text:
If you are using collate_fn, and num_workers>0 with PyTorch version < 0.4:
MAKE SURE YOU DON'T RETURN ZERO DIM TENSORS FROM YOUR __getitem__() FUNCTION.
OR RETURN THEM AS NUMPY ARRAYS.

I fixed my bug of returning zeros dim tensors and the problem still exists.
body:
> If you are using collate_fn, and num_workers>0 with PyTorch version < 0.4:
> 
> MAKE SURE YOU DON'T RETURN ZERO DIM TENSORS FROM YOUR `__getitem__()` FUNCTION.
> OR RETURN THEM AS NUMPY ARRAYS.

I fixed my bug of returning zeros dim tensors and the problem still exists.
